# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the hand pose parameters that’s viewable in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing hand pose model parameters

- **description**: A text representation of the hand pose parameters.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the hand pose parameters suitable for debugging.
